messages.title: My Local Action Plan
messages.content: Listening to local residents in Lee Green

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Help for Families in Hard Times
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keeping people in work, helping families stay in their homes - nothing can be important.
Whilst local crime has fallen since 1997, many people remain worried. We need new solutions.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Better Deal on Trains & Buses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need more rush hour trains and better bus services. Bring the tube to Lewisham!
Lewisham's young people deserve the best - I will do everything I can to help them realise their dreams.
I understand how people are fed up with politicians - I will bring a fresh approach.

leaflet.personalStatement: With the General Election just weeks away, I am writing to ask for your support in becoming the next MP for Lewisham East. I've lived in Lewisham for eight years and whilst I love it, I know that there is still much that needs to change. This election is about our future: securing economic recovery, protecting our frontline public services and cleaning up politics. I hope you will feel able to trust me with your vote.

images.caption: Listening to local residents in Lee Green
Vote Heidi Alexander for Lewisham East's future

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains pictures of Heidi Alexander with residents and supporters, as well as campaign messages and contact information.
